37 That/for/because/then/when committed_adultery and_blood in/on/at/with_hands_fat/best and_DOM idols_fat/best committed_adultery and_also DOM (the)_sons_fat/best which/who bore to_me offered_up to/for_them for_food.

38 Again/more this(f) they_had_acquired to_me defiled DOM sanctuary_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front in_the_day (the)_that and_DOM sabbaths_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front profaned.

39 And_in/on/at/with_slaughtered_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out DOM (the)_sons_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front for/of/from/to/to_the_idols_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and_they_came to/towards sanctuary_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front in_the_day (the)_that for/of/from/to/to_the_profane_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_see/lo/see.

this they_had_acquired in_the_middle house_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front.

40 And_even that/for/because/then/when sent for_the/to_the/to/for_men come from/from_the_far_away which/who messenger sent to_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and_see/lo/see.

came for_the/to_the/to/for_which/as bathed painted eyes_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_adorned_yourself ornaments.

41 And_sat on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in couch stately and_table spread for/of/from/to/to_the_your_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters and_incense_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_oil_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front placed on_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters.

42 And_voice/sound crowd carefree in/on/at/with_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor and_near/to men from_increase_in_number humankind drunkards brought from/from_the_wilderness and_put bracelets to/towards arms_fat/best and_crowns beautiful on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in heads_their.

43 And_said for_the/to_the/to/for_worn_out adulteries now prostitute fornication_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters and_she.

44 And_gone_in to_her/it like/according_to_go_in to/towards woman/wife prostitute yes/correct/thus/so they_went to/near Oholah and_near/to Oholibah women the_lewd.

45 And_men righteous they(emph) judge mmm_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front judgment adulteresses and_judgment shed blood that/for/because/then/when adulteresses they(f) and_blood in/on/at/with_hands_their.

46 that/for/because/then/when thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD bring_up against_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front assembly and_make mmm_fat/best for/of/from/to/to_the_terror and_and/for/for_the/to/to_the_plunder.

47 And_stone on_fat/best stones assembly and_cut_~_down mmm_fat/best in/on/at/with_swords_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out (the)_sons_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and_daughters_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front kill and_your(pl)_fat/best in/on/at/with_fire burn.

48 And_put_an_end lewdness from/more_than the_earth/land and_take_warning all/each/any/every the_women and_not commit like/according_to_lewdness_you.

49 And_repay lewdness_your upon_you and_penalty idolatry_your bear and_know that/for/because/then/when I my_master/master GOD.

The peggukum te God te nations

(25:1–32:32)

26:1 The peglegpad te Tiru

↑ 26  and_he/it_was in/on/at/with_one_of teen year in/on/at/with_one for_the/to_the/to/for_month it_became word YHWH to_me to_say.

2 Son_of humankind because which/who Tsor said on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Yerushalayim aha broken gateway the_peoples swung_open to_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front filled lies_in_ruins.

3 For_so/thus/hence thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD wow_I/me against_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire Tsor and_bring_up against_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire nations many like/according_to_brings_up the_sea for/of/from/to/to_the_waves_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces.

4 And_destroy walls Tsor and_break_down towers_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters and_scrape soil_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor from_her/it and_make mmm_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor to/for_bare rock.

5 place_for_the_spreading nets you(ms)_will_be in_the_middle the_sea that/for/because/then/when I spoken declares my_master/master GOD and_become for/of/from/to/to_the_plunder for_the/to_the/to/for_nations.

6 And_her/its_daughters which/who in_the_field in/on/at/with_/drought/knife/sword killed and_know that/for/because/then/when I YHWH.

7 that/for/because/then/when thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD wow_I/me bring to/towards Tsor Nebuchadnezzar king Babel from/from_the_north king kings in/on/at/with_horses and_in/on/at/with_chariots and_in/on/at/with_cavalry and_assembly and_army great.

8 Daughters_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in_the_field in/on/at/with_/drought/knife/sword kill and_he/it_gave against_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire siege_works and_build against_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire ramp and_raise against_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire shields.

9 And_blows battering_rams_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law he/it_gave in/on/at/with_walls_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_towers_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire break_down in/on/at/with_axes_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces.

10 From/from_the_so_many horses_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces cover_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire dust_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out from/from_the_noise cavalry and_wagons and_chariots shake walls_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_enters_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law in/on/at/with_gates_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire according_to_enter (a)_city breached.

11 In/on/at/with_hoofs horses_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces trample DOM all/each/any/every streets_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire people_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_/drought/knife/sword kill and_pillars strong_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and/for/for_the/to/to_the_earth/land fall.

12 And_plunder wealth_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_loot merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_break_down walls_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_your(pl) fine_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire destroy and_stones_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_timber_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_soil_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in_the_middle waters throw.

13 And_put_an_end noise songs_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_voice/sound lyres_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire not heard again/more.

14 And_I_will_give_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire to/for_bare rock place_for_the_spreading nets you(ms)_will_be not rebuilt again/more that/for/because/then/when I YHWH spoken declares my_master/master GOD.

15 thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD for/of/from/to/to_the_Tsor the_(one)/the/am_not from/from_the_sound fall_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_groan wounded in/on/at/with_ slaughter _killed in/on/at/with_midst_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire the_coastlands shake.

16 And_step_down from_under thrones_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out all princes the_sea and_remove DOM robes_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and_DOM garments embroidered_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out strip_off trembling clothe on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in the_earth/land sit and_tremble to/for_moments and_appalled at_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

17 And_raise over_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire lamentation and_say to/for_you(fs) how perished inhabited from/from_the_seas the_city the_renowned which/who she/it_was mighty in/on/at/with_sea she/it and_inhabitants_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters which/who imposed terror_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out to/from_all/each/any/every inhabitants_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters.

18 Now the_coastlands tremble day fall_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_terrified the_islands which/who in/on/at/with_sea from/from_the_passing_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

19 that/for/because/then/when thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD in/on/at/with_make_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front DOM_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire (a)_city desolate like_the_cities which/who not inhabited in/on/at/with_bring_up over_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire DOM deep and_cover_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire the_waters the_great.

20 And_bring_~_down_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire DOM go_down pit to/towards people long_ago and_dwell_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in_land below as_ruins from_long_ago/eternity DOM go_down pit so_that not inhabited and_set splendor in_land life(pl).

21 Terrors bring_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_no_more_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_sought and_not found again/more for/of/from/to/to_the_long_ago/eternity declares my_master/master GOD.

↑ 27  and_he/it_was word YHWH to_me to_say.

2 And_you(ms) son_of humankind raise on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Tsor lament.

3 And_say for/of/from/to/to_the_Tsor the_sits on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in entrance sea merchant the_peoples to/towards coastlands many thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD Tsor you said I perfect beauty.

4 In/on/at/with_heart seas borders_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire builders_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire perfected beauty_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

5 Pine_trees from/from_the_Senir they_had_built to/for_you(fs) DOM all/each/any/every planks cedar from/from_the_Lebanon took for_doing mast for_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

6 Oaks from/from_the_Bashan they_had_acquired oars_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire deck_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire they_had_acquired ivory daughter_of daughter_of-cypresses from_coasts Cyprus.

7 Fine_~_linen in/on/at/with_embroidered from_Miʦrayim/Miʦərayim/(Egypt) it_became sail_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire to_be to/for_you(fs) for/of/from/to/to_the_banner blue and_purple from_coasts ʼElīshāˊh it_became awning_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

8 Inhabitants Tsīdōn and_Arvad they_were rowers to/for_you(fs) skilled_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire Tsor they_were in/on/at/with_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire they(emph) pilots_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

9 Elders Gebal and_wise_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters they_were in/on/at/with_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire repairing seams_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire all/each/any/every ships the_sea and_sailors_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front they_were in/on/at/with_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire for_the/to_the/to/for_barter_for wares_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

10 Fāraş and_Lud and_Put they_were in/on/at/with_army_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire men_of war_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire shield and_helmet hung in/on/at/with_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire they(emph) gave splendor_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

11 Sons_of Arvad and_Helech on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in walls_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire all_around and_Gammadites in/on/at/with_towers_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire they_were shields_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front hung on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in walls_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire all_around they(emph) perfected beauty_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

12 Tarshish did_business_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire from_increase_in_number all/each/any/every wealth in/on/at/with_silver iron tin and_lead exchanged merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

13 Yavan Tubal and_Meshek they(emph) traded_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_living_creature humankind and_vessels copper/brass/bronze//coin exchanged merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

14 From/from_the_household Togarmah horses and_war_horses and_mules exchanged wares_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

15 Sons_of Dedan traded_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire coastlands many markets influence_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire tusks ivory and_ebony brought_back payment_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

16 Rām did_business_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire from_increase_in_number products_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_turquoise purple and_embroidered_work and_fine_linen and_coral and_rubies exchanged in/on/at/with_merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

17 Yehuda and_land Yisrael they(emph) traded_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_wheat minnith and_millet and_honey and_oil and_balm exchanged merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

18 Dammeseq did_business_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_increase_in_number products_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire from_increase_in_number all/each/any/every wealth in/on/at/with_wine Helbon and_wool white.

19 Vedan and_Yavan from_Uzal in/on/at/with_merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire exchanged iron wrought cassia and_calamus in/on/at/with_merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire it_became.

20 Dedan traded_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_garments woven_material for/of/from/to/to_the_riding.

21 Arabia and_all princes Kedar they(emph) customers hand_of_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_lambs and_rams and_goats in/on/at/with_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out did_business_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

23 Ḩārān and_Canneh and_ˊĒden merchants Sheba Ashshur/Assyria Chilmad traded_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

25 Ships Tarshish carriers_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire wares_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_filled and_heavily_loaded very in/on/at/with_heart seas.

26 In/on/at/with_water high brought_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire the_rowers DOM_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire wind the_east wrecked_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_heart seas.

27 Wealth_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire mariners_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_pilots_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire repair leaks_servant/question and_dealers merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_all men_of war_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire which/who on/over_you(fs) and_on/over_all crew_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire which/who in/on/at/with_midst_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire sink in/on/at/with_heart seas in/on_day downfall_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire.

28 To_sound/voice cry pilots_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire countryside shakes.

29 And_down_~_come from_ships_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front all handle oar mariners all pilots the_sea to/towards the_earth/land stand.

30 And_raise over_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_her/its_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out and_cry bitterly and_throw dust on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in heads_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front in/on/at/with_ashes roll.

31 And_shave for_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire bald and_put_on sackcloth and_weep over_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_bitterness creature mourning bitter.

32 And_raise for_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_I/me_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front lamentation and_lament over_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire who.

like_Tsor like/according_to_silenced in_the_middle the_sea.

34 Now broken from/from_the_seas in/on/at/with_depths waters merchandise_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire and_all crew_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire in/on/at/with_midst_longing/pain/pregnancy/bed/heart/you(fs)/husband/you(ms)/head/man/thoughts/worries/dream/desire sunk.

↑ 29  in/on/at/with_year the_tenth in/on/at/with_tenth in/on/at/with_two ten for_the/to_the/to/for_month it_became word YHWH to_me to_say.

2 Son_of humankind set your(ms)_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Farəˊoh king Miʦərayim/(Egypt) and_prophesy on/upon/above_him/it and_under Miʦərayim all_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor.

3 Speak and_say thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD wow_I/me on/upon_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces Farəˊoh king Miʦərayim the_monster the_great the_lying in_the_middle streams_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces which/who he/it_had_said to_me nile_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_I I_have_made_I/me.

4 And_put hooks in/on/at/with_jaws_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_stick fish streams_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces in/on/at/with_scales_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_bring_~_up_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces from/from_the_midst streams_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_DOM all/each/any/every fish streams_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces in/on/at/with_scales_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces sticking.

5 And_fling_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces the_wilderness_Miʦərayim/(Egypt)/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

↑ 31  and_he/it_was in/on/at/with_one(f) teen year in/on/at/with_third in/on/at/with_one for_the/to_the/to/for_month it_became word YHWH to_me to_say.

2 Son_of humankind say to/towards Farəˊoh king Miʦərayim and_near/to hordes_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law to/towards who.

like in/on/at/with_greatness_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces.

3 Behold/lo/see.

Ashshur/Assyria cedar in/on/at/with_Lebanon beautiful branches and_forest shade and_great height and_between clouds she/it_was top_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law.

4 Waters nourished_neighbour/him/it/kind deep grow_tall_neighbour/him/it/kind DOM rivers_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters flow all_around planted_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor and_DOM channels_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters sent to/towards all/each/any/every tree/wood_of the_field.

5 On/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in yes/correct/thus/so towered height_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law from_all tree/wood_of the_field and_grew_large boughs_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces and_long branches_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces from/from_the_waters abundant in/on/at/with_shoots_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law.

6 In/on/at/with_boughs_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces nested all/each/any/every bird the_heavens and_under branches_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces gave_birth all being/animal the_field and_in/on/at/with_shade_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law lived all nations great.

7 And_beautiful in/on/at/with_greatness_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law in/on/at/with_length branches_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces that/for/because/then/when it_became roots_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law to/towards waters abundant.

8 Cedars not rival_neighbour/him/it/kind in/on/at/with_garden Elohim fir_trees not equal to/towards boughs_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces and_plane_trees not they_were like/according_to_branches_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces all/each/any/every tree/word in/on/at/with_garden Elohim not compare to_him/it in/on/at/with_beauty_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law.

9 Beautiful made_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces in/on/at/with_increase_in_number branches_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces and_envied_neighbour/him/it/kind all/each/any/every tree/wood_of ˊĒden which/who in/on/at/with_garden the_Elohim.

10 for_so/thus/hence thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD because which/who towered in/on/at/with_high and_he/it_gave top_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law to/towards between clouds and_proud heart_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law in/on/at/with_height_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law.

11 And_gave_neighbour/him/it/kind in/on/at/with_hand ruler nations to_deal he_would_deal to_him/it like/according_to_wickedness_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law throw_~_out_neighbour/him/it/kind.

12 And_cut_~_down_neighbour/him/it/kind foreigners ruthless nations and_left_neighbour/him/it/kind to/towards the_mountains and_on/over_all valleys they_have_fallen branches_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces and_broken boughs_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces in/on/at/with_all/each/every/any ravines the_earth/land and_went_away from/from_the_shade_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law all/each/any/every peoples the_earth/land and_left_neighbour/him/it/kind.

13 On/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in fallen_trunk_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law dwell all/each/any/every bird the_heavens and_near/to branches_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces they_were all being/animal the_field.

14 Therefore which/who not lofty in/on/at/with_height_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out all/each/any/every tree/wood_of waters and_not set DOM tops_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out to/towards between clouds and_not reach trees_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front in/on/at/with_height_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out all/each/any/every drink water that/for/because/then/when all_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out given_over for_the/to_the/to/for_death to/towards earth/land below in_the_middle sons_of humankind to/towards go_down pit.

15 thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD in/on_day went_down_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law sheol_Miʦərayim/(Egypt)/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

/land/Gerara caused_grieving closed on/upon/above_him/it DOM deep and_held_back rivers_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters and_restrained waters many and_clothed_~_ingloom on/upon/above_him/it Lebanon and_all tree/wood_of the_field on/upon/above_him/it fainted.

16 From/from_the_sound fall_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law quake nations in/on/at/with_go_down_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front DOM_him/it sheol_Miʦərayim/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

/land/Gerara DOM go_down pit and_comforted in_land below all/each/any/every tree/wood_of ˊĒden choice and_good Lebanon all/each/any/every drink water.

17 Also/yet they with_him/it went_down sheol_Miʦərayim/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

/land/Gerara to/towards slain sword and_allies_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law lived in/on/at/with_shade_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law in_the_middle nations.

18 To/towards who.

compared thus in/on/at/with_glory and_in/on/at/with_greatness in/on/at/with_trees ˊĒden and_brought_down DOM tree/wood_of ˊĒden to/towards earth/land below in_the_middle uncircumcised lie DOM slain sword he/it Farəˊoh and_all hordes_Miʦərayim/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

/land/Gerara declares my_master/master GOD.

32:1 Impanunggiling te buaya ka Hari te Egypt

↑ 32  and_he/it_was in/on/at/with_two_of teen year in/on/at/with_both_of ten month in/on/at/with_one for_the/to_the/to/for_month it_became word YHWH to_me to_say.

2 Son_of humankind raise lamentation on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Farəˊoh king Miʦərayim/(Egypt) and_say to_him/it lion nations compared and_you(ms) just_monster in_the_seas and_thrash_about in/on/at/with_rivers_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_trouble waters in/on/at/with_feet_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_foul rivers_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out.

3 Thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD and_spread on/upon_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces DOM net_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front in/on/at/with_assembly peoples many and_haul_~_up_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces in/on/at/with_net_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front.

4 And_throw_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces in/on_the_earth on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in face/surface_of the_field hurl_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_settle on/upon_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces all/each/any/every bird the_heavens and_gorge with_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces being/animal all/each/any/every the_earth/land.

5 And_put DOM flesh_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in the_mountains and_fill the_valleys carcass_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces.

6 And_drench earth/land flowing_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces from/from_the_blood_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces to/towards the_mountains and_ravines filled_(emph)/.

with_you(ms).

7 And_cover in/on/at/with_snuff_~_out_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces heavens and_darken DOM stars_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front sun in/on/at/with_cloud cover_him/it/he and_moon not he_will_give_light light_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law.

8 All/each/any/every shining light in/on/at/with_heavens/the_heavens darken_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out on/upon_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_put darkness on/upon your(ms)_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces declares my_master/master GOD.

9 And_trouble hearts peoples many in/on/at/with_bring_about_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front destruction_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces in/on/at/with_nations on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in countries which/who not known_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out.

10 And_appalled on/upon_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces peoples many and_kings_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front shudder on/upon_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces horror in/on/at/with_brandish_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front sword_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in their/face/your(pl)/in_front_of_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and_tremble to/for_moments (a)_man for/of/from/to/to_the_life_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law in/on_day downfall_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces.

11 that/for/because/then/when thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD sword king Babel come_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces.

12 In/on/at/with_swords mighty fall hordes_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces ruthless nations all_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out and_devastate DOM pride Miʦərayim/(Egypt) and_destroyed all/each/any/every hordes_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor.

13 And_destroy DOM all/each/any/every cattle_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor from_under waters many and_not trouble_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out foot humankind again/more and_hoofs cattle/livestock not trouble_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out.

14 Then settle waters_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and_rivers_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out just_oil flow declares my_master/master GOD.

15 In/on/at/with_make_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front DOM earth/land Miʦərayim desolation and_ earth/land _is_emptied from/from_the_all_that_fills_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor in/on/at/with_strike_down_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front DOM all/each/any/every live in/on/at/with_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor and_know that/for/because/then/when I YHWH.

16 Lament she/it and_chant_sons/descendants/her/it/it(f)/lips/mouth/the/daughters daughters_of the_nations chant mmm_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Miʦərayim and_under all/each/any/every hordes_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor chant mmm_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor declares my_master/master GOD.

The saad te God te keet-etawan din

(33:1–37:27)

18 Son_of humankind wail on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in hordes Miʦərayim/(Egypt) and_bring_~_down_neighbour/him/it/kind mmm_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor and_daughters nations mighty to/towards earth/land below DOM go_down pit.

/land/Gerara and_laid_Miʦərayim/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

33:1 Si Isikil isip talagbantey te Israel

(Isi. 3:16-21)

8 In/on/at/with_say_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and/for/for_the/to/to_the_wicked wicked to_die you(ms)_will_die and_not speak for/of/from/to/to_the_warn wicked from/from_the_its_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law he/it wicked in/on/at/with_iniquity_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law die and_blood_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law from/from_the_hand_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces require.

9 And_you(ms) that/for/because/then/when warn wicked from/from_the_its_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and/for/for_the/to/to_the_turn from_her/it and_not turn from/from_the_its_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law he/it in/on/at/with_iniquity_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law die and_you(ms) life_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces saved.

10 and_you(ms) son_of humankind say to/towards house_of Yisrael yes/correct/thus/so said to_say that/for/because/then/when transgressions_appearance/pattern/both_hands/image/ourselves/us/will_console/comfort_us/work/likeness/action and_sins_appearance/pattern/both_hands/image/ourselves/us/will_console/comfort_us/work/likeness/action upon_appearance/pattern/both_hands/image/ourselves/us/will_console/comfort_us/work/likeness/action and_in/on/at/with_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out we wasting_away and_how live.

11 Say to_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front he/it_lived I declares my_master/master GOD if take_~_pleasure in/on/at/with_death the_wicked that/for/because/then/when if in/on/at/with_turn wicked from/from_the_its_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_live turn_back turn_back from/from_the_ways_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces the_evil and_for_what.

die house_of Yisrael.

12 and_you(ms) son_of humankind say to/towards sons_of people_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces righteousness the_righteous not save_him/it/he in/on_day transgression_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_wickedness the_wicked not stumble in/on/at/with_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor in/on_day turns_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law from_wickedness_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_righteous not he/it_would_be_able to/for_live in/on/at/with_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor in/on_day sins_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law.

13 In/on/at/with_say_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front for_the/to_the/to/for_righteous to_live he_will_live and_he trusts on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in righteousness_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_does iniquity all/each/any/every righteous_deeds_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces not remembered and_in/on/at/with_injustice_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law which/who he/it_had_made in/on/over_him/it die.

14 And_in/on/at/with_say_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and/for/for_the/to/to_the_wicked to_die you(ms)_will_die and_turns from_sin_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_does justice and_right.

15 Pledge returns wicked what_~_hastaken_by_robbery give_back in/on/at/with_statutes the_life walks to_not to_make injustice to_live he_will_live not die.

16 All/each/any/every sins_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces which/who committed not remembered to_him/it justice and_right he/it_had_made to_live he_will_live.

17 And_say sons_of people_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces not just road/way_of my_master/master and_it way_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out not just.

18 In/on/at/with_turns law-abiding/just from/from_the_righteousness_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_does injustice and_die in/on/at/with_them/nations.

19 And_in/on/at/with_turns wicked from_wickedness_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_does justice and_right by_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front he/it live.

20 And_say not just road/way_of my_master/master (a)_man according_to_ways_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces judge mmm_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces house_of Yisrael

33:21 The pegkahuhus te Jerusalem

21 [ref] 22 

21 and_he/it_was in/on/at/with_two_of teen year in/on/at/with_tenth in/on/at/with_fifth for_the/to_the/to/for_month for/of/from/to/to_the_exile_appearance/pattern/both_hands/image/ourselves/us/will_console/comfort_us/work/likeness/action he/it_came to_me the_who_had_escaped from/from_the_Yərūshālayim to_say the_city fallen.

22 And_hand YHWH she/it_was to_me in/on/at/with_evening to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before the_fugitive came and_opened DOM mouth_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front until came to_me in/on/at/with_morning and_opened mouth_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_not unable_to_speak again/more.

33:23 The sale te keet-etawan

23 and_he/it_was word YHWH to_me to_say.

24 Son_of humankind inhabitants the_ruins the_these on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in land Yisrael saying to_say one(ms) it_became ʼAvərāhām and_possessed DOM the_earth/land and_we many to/for_us the_earth/land given for/of/from/to/to_the_possession.

25 for_so/thus/hence say to_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in the_blood eat and_eyes_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces lift_up to/towards idols_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces and_blood shed and_the_earth possess.

26 Rely on/upon sword_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces commit abominations and_man DOM wife_of his/its_neighbour defiles and_the_earth possess.

27 this say to_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD he/it_lived I if not which/who in/on/at/with_ruins in/on/at/with_/drought/knife/sword fall and_which/as on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in face/surface_of the_field for_the/to_the/to/for_living I_will_give_dreams/father/generations/him/it/planks/and/face/woman/two_nostrils/drinking/god/days/ribs/life/feast/women/wives/officials/faces for/of/from/to/to_the_devoured_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law and_which in/on/at/with_strongholds and_in/on/at/with_caves in/on/at/with_plague die.

28 And_make DOM the_earth/land desolation and_waste and_come_to_an_end proud strength_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor and_desolate mountains Yisrael from_no pass_through.

33:30 The kapangkusan te lalag te prupita

30 31 32 33 

30 and_you(ms) son_of humankind sons_of people_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces the_talking_together in/on/at/with_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces by the_walls and_in/on/at/with_doorways the_houses and_saying one DOM another (a)_man DOM his/its_woman to_say come now and_hear what the_thing/the_word/matter the_comes from_DOM YHWH.

31 And_come to_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces according_to_come people and_sit to_your_face people_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_hear DOM words_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_mmm_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out not do that/for/because/then/when passion in/on/at/with_mouths_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front they(emph) showing after gain_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out her/its_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out pursue.

32 And_see_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces to/for_them like/according_to_songs love beautiful sound/voice and_well plays_~_onan_instrument and_hear DOM words_kindred/female_slave/descendants/belly/brother/front/sound/abdomen/hand/servants/face/you(ms)/seed/voice/land/woman/eat/fruit/life/wife/name/both_nostrils/return/yourself(m)/faces and_do not_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out mmm_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out.

33 And_in/on/at/with_comes_interpretation/kind/name/husband/heart/her/it/fruit/it/produce/house/seed/voice/man/ascended/womb/him/it/uterus/vigor see/lo/see.

come and_know that/for/because/then/when prophet it_became in/on/at/with_midst_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out.

34:1 The me talagtameng te Israel

342 3 4 5 [ref] 6 

7 8 9 10 

↑ 34  and_he/it_was word YHWH to_me to_say.

2 Son_of humankind prophesy on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in shepherds Yisrael prophesy and_say to_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and/for/for_the/to/to_the_shepherds thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD woe shepherds Yisrael which/who they_were feeding mmm_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out am_not the_flock feed the_shepherds.

3 DOM the_fat eat and_DOM the_wool clothe the_fat slaughter the_flock not feed.

4 DOM the_weak not strengthened and_DOM the_sick not healed and_for_the/to_the/to/for_injured not bound_up and_DOM the_strays not brought_back and_DOM the_lost not sought and_in/on/at/with_force ruled DOM_them and_in/on/at/with_harshness.

5 And_scattered from/from_the_there_was_no shepherd and_became for_food to/from_all/each/any/every being/animal the_field and_scattered.

6 Wandered flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front in_all the_mountains and_under all/each/any/every hill high and_under all/each/any/every face/surface_of the_earth/land they_were_scattered flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_there_was_no search and_there_was_no seek.

7 For_so/thus/hence shepherds hear DOM word/matter_of YHWH.

8 He/it_lived I declares my_master/master GOD if not because to_be flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and/for/for_the/to/to_the_prey and_become flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front for_food to/from_all/each/any/every being/animal the_field from_no shepherd and_not search_for shepherds_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front DOM flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_fed the_shepherds mmm_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out and_DOM flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front not fed.

9 for_so/thus/hence the_shepherds hear word/matter_of YHWH.

10 Thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD wow_I/me to/near the_shepherds and_demand DOM flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front from/from_the_hand_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out and_put_a_stop_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out from_feeding flock_of_sheep/goats and_not feed again/more the_shepherds mmm_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out and_rescue flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front from/from_the_her/its_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front and_not be to/for_them for_food.

34:11 The maddeet me talagtameng te me karniru

11 that/for/because/then/when thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD wow_I/me myself and_search_for DOM sheep_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_seek_~_out_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out.

12 Like/according_to_seek_out shepherd herd_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law in/on_day is_kind/day/illusion/descendants/road/property/spirit/him/it/wind/firstborn/being_alone/top/coming_out/likeness/hand/course/content/seed/kingdom/language/woman/by_him/it/desire/son/goats/fruit/heart/house(hold)/donation/head/resemblance/sleep/longing/offering/wife/name/flock_of_sheep/image/mother/breath/daughter-in-law in/on/at/with_middle his/its_flock_of_sheep/goats scattered yes/correct/thus/so look_after DOM sheep_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_rescue mmm_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front from_all the_places which/who they_were_scattered there in/on_day clouds and_darkness.

13 And_bring_~_out_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out from/more_than the_peoples and_gather_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out from/more_than the_countries and_bring_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out to/towards land_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out and_feed_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out to/towards mountains Yisrael in/on/at/with_ravines and_in/on/at/with_all/each/every/any inhabited_places the_earth/land.

14 In/on/at/with_pasture good feed DOM_them and_in/on/at/with_mountain heights Yisrael will_belong pasture_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front there lie_down in/on/at/with_grazing_land good and_pasture rich feed to/towards mountains Yisrael.

15 I tend flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_I lie_down_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out declares my_master/master GOD.

16 DOM the_lost seek and_DOM the_strays bring_back and_for_the/to_the/to/for_injured bind_up and_DOM the_weak strengthen and_DOM the_fat and_DOM the_strong destroy feed_her/it/it(f) in/on/at/with_justice.

17 And_you flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD wow_I/me judge between sheep and/for/for_the/to/to_the_sheep and/for/for_the/to/to_the_rams and_and/for/for_the/to/to_the_goats.

18 The_not_enough from/from_the_you the_pasture the_good feed_on and_rest pasture_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces trample in/on/at/with_feet_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces and_clear waters drink and_DOM the_rest in/on/at/with_feet_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces muddy_(emph)/.

.

19 And_flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front what_~_havetrodden feet_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces eat and_what_~_havemuddied feet_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces drink.

20 for_so/thus/hence thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD to_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front wow_I/me myself and_judge between sheep fat and_between sheep lean.

21 Because in/on/at/with_flank and_in/on/at/with_shoulder pushed and_in/on/at/with_horns_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces butted all/each/any/every the_weak until which/who scattered mmm_them to/towards the_outside_Miʦərayim/(Egypt)/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

/land/Gerara.

22 And_save for/of/from/to/to_the_flock_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front and_not be again/more and/for/for_the/to/to_the_prey and_judge between sheep and/for/for_the/to/to_the_sheep.

23 And_set_up over_appearance/drinking/them/kind/feast/face/front shepherd one(ms) and_feed mmm_fat/best DOM servant_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front Dāvid he/it feed DOM_them and_he will_belong and/for/for_the/to/to_the_fat/best for/of/from/to/to_the_shepherd.

21 And_had_concern on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in name_of holy_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front which/who profaned_neighbour/him/it/kind house_of Yisrael in/on/at/with_nations which/who they_went ~there_Miʦərayim/(Egypt)/interpretation/Sedom/south/are/days/mystery/king/now.

/land/Gerara.

22 for_so/thus/hence say for/of/from/to/to_the_house_of/his/its Yisrael thus he/it_had_said my_master/master GOD not for_~_sake_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces I producing house_of Yisrael that/for/because/then/when if for/of/from/to/to_the_name_of/name holy_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front which/who profaned in/on/at/with_nations which/who went there.

23 And_vindicate_the_holiness DOM name_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front the_great the_profaned in/on/at/with_nations which/who profaned in/on/at/with_midst_group/end/four/them/food/lands/name/army/objects/property/creation/beginning/clans/language/delicacy/being/pulling_out and_ the_nations _know that/for/because/then/when I YHWH declares my_master/master GOD in/on/at/with_show_~_holy_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front in/on/at/with_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces for/of/from/to/to_the_your(pl)/both_eyes_of_them/nations.

24 And_take mmm_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces from/more_than the_nations and_gather mmm_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces from_all the_countries and_bring mmm_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces to/towards land_your_own.

27 And_DOM my_breath/wind/spirit put in/on/at/with_inner_parts_to_eat/drink/food/you(pl)/eyes/faces and_cause DOM which/who in/on/at/with_statutes_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front follow and_ordinances_kindred/brother/master/wound/spirit/wind/sound/bruise/me/face/speech/voice/evil/punishment/flesh/stripe/body/head/perversity/master/discourse/guilt/bones/breath/fathers/front careful and_observe.

30 And_increase DOM fruit(sg) the_tree and_produce the_field so_that which/who not suffer again/more disgrace famine in/on/at/with_nations.
